## okta-admin idps clonekey

Clones a X.509 certificate for an IdP signing key credential from a source IdP to target IdP.

### Synopsis

Clones a X.509 certificate for an IdP signing key credential from a source IdP to target IdP.

```
okta-admin idps clonekey <idpId> <keyId> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for clonekey
```
